name: BrainBreak
description:
Introduction

BrainBreak is a tile/puzzle game for the c64 with several surprising features. It uses hires multicolour graphics and comes with 100 exciting, brain-breaking levels
that can be extended by using the included editor. BrainBreak can be played on the original machine as well as using emulators.

The story is simple: try to keep your mind while restoring the order of the
holy gems. They were spread across the universe, each pattern in an own
world. Restoring the ancient patterns, you will find glory, health, and divine
salvation.

May the gems be with you!

Features

While playing the game, you will be confronted with gates, teleporters,
temporary and permanent glue fields, morphers that change the stones, etc.

Availability

You may purchase a digital copy here. You will get access to a .d64-file that contains a copy of the game as well as to the .pdf-documentation.

A physical version can be pre-ordered from Psytronik. You may find the page for ordering physical versions of the game here: https://psytronik.bigcartel.com/product/brainbreak-c64. Physical versions of the game should be available at the end of June 2022.

The free demo includes only the 20 first levels.

Credits

Code and graphics by Daniel Krajzewicz, music by Antti Hannula.

The walkthrough video was supported by VIPER's Retrogame videos channel.

Further information

If you are interested in my projects, please visit my pages at https://www.krajzewicz.de.
